participant_1.background:
I love the freedom of being my own boss.
my mother is a housemaid.
I enjoy eating hummus and pita bread, but I am not very close to my family.
I chill out by listening to music, reading about my favorite charities, and watching funny movies.
i love the smell of beans.

participant_2.background:
I spend time with my family and friends to feel better.
I enjoy listening to the music of Katy Perry as it reminds me of my younger years.
I want to start working on my prototype.
My family is close and we like to go out for ice cream together.
i live in a small city.

content.text: Hey there! I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about yourself?
Doing good, thanks! I'm just chilling out and listening to music. What are you up to?
I'm working on a prototype for a new project I'm working on. It's really exciting!
That's awesome! What kind of project is it?
It's a new kind of ice cream machine! I'm hoping to start a business with it.
That sounds really cool! I love ice cream!
Me too! I'm really excited about it. I'm hoping to have it ready to go by the end of the year.
That's great! I'm sure it will be a success.
What kind of music are you listening to?
I'm listening to Katy Perry. She's one of my favorite artists.
I love Katy Perry! She's so good!
Me too! Her music always puts me in a good mood.
